member.name: T:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Definitions.AuthenticationMethod
member.summary: Authentication options to authenticate to Salesforce.

member.name: F:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Definitions.AuthenticationMethod.OAuth2WithPassword
member.summary: Authenticate by providing required informations to fetch OAuth2 access token.

member.name: P:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Input.Domain
member.summary: Salesforce Domain. /services/data/v52.0/query will be added automatically, so the domain is enough.

member.name: P:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Options.ClientID
member.summary: Client ID to get OAuth2 token.

member.name: P:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Options.ClientSecret
member.summary: Client secret to get OAuth2 access token.

member.name: P:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Options.Username
member.summary: Username of the user which will be used to fetch OAuth2 access token.

member.name: P:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Options.SecurityToken
member.summary: Security token for the user, which is required to add with the password by Salesforce.

member.name: P:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Options.ReturnAccessToken
member.summary: Also return access token which is fetched during authentication?

member.name: P:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Options.ThrowAnErrorIfNotFound
member.summary: Set whether process will throw an error if targeted id can not be found from Salesforce.

member.name: P:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Result.ErrorException
member.summary: Exception that was thrown by the server.

member.name: P:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Result.ErrorMessage
member.example: System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Request failed with status code Unauthorized

member.name: M:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery(Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Input,Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Options,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.returns: Object { JObject Body, bool RequestIsSuccessful, Exception ErrorException, string ErrorMessage, string Token }

member.name: M:Frends.Salesforce.ExecuteQuery.Salesforce.GetAccessToken(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get OAuth2 access token. This method is public since it is used also in Unit tests.
